metadata.title: GOLBERG G Unisex No Show Socks - Low Cut Casual Cotton Socks - Multiple Sizes and Colors - Non-Slide Socks
features: MATERIAL: Golberg’s no show socks are made of 80% Cotton, 17% Polyester, and 3% Spandex. This breathable combination makes them perfect for casual wear around the house, at school, work, or while running errands.

NO SHOW: Our socks are low cut, making them the perfect no show socks for many different styles of shoes. Machine washable and moisture wicking, our socks will feel soft and breathable on your feet. Washing Instructions: Machine wash, tumble dry on medium heat, only color safe non-chlorine bleach when needed, do not iron.

SIZE: We are proud to offer our socks in both a medium and large size. The medium size fits men's US shoe size 5-9, and women's US shoe size 7-11. The large size fits men's US shoe size 9.5-13, and women's US shoe size 11.5-13.

FEATURES: With three silicone strips at the heel of each sock, they don’t slide or slip off. The top of the sock comes up high enough to cushion the tongue of your shoes to prevent chafing. The back-grip pads keep our socks in place, so they won’t end up under your feet or balled up in your shoe.
PACK INCLUDES: Choose between packs of all black, all white, or mixed black and white. Each pack comes with six (6) pairs of socks and is available in medium and large sizes.
